plot outline: Adhya and Rambha trap two innocent men Peter and Aswath to utilize them for their own needs. The sincere-in-love boys faithfully court for the girls, who have a secret affair with two other guys whom they want to marry. The girls get to know their fated future that their husbands will die in five days after the wedding. The dramatic turn from here is the rest of the story of Rojulu Marayi.
title: Rojulu Marayi
plot: Adhya and Rambha trap two innocent men Peter and Aswath to utilize them for their own needs. The sincere-in-love boys faithfully court for the girls, who have a secret affair with two other guys whom they want to marry. The girls get to know their fated future that their husbands will die in five days after the wedding. The dramatic turn from here is the rest of the story of _Rojulu Marayi_ (qv).
